The Rootle.ai extension for Chrome is a powerful tool for Recruiters who need to gather data from job boards quickly and easily. With just a few clicks, you can extract job data from multiple job boards and save it to your Rootle.ai account.

The Rootle.ai extension is designed for efficiency and ease of use. Navigate to the job board you want to scrape, activate the extension, and select the data you want to extract. You can extract the candidate's name and phone number. The extension automatically saves the data to your Rootle.ai account, where you can easily manage and analyze it.

With Rootle.ai, you can save time and streamline your candidate search or recruitment efforts. The extension works with a variety of popular job boards, including Naukri, LinkedIn, Glassdoor, Indeed, and more. Plus, Rootle.ai's advanced AI algorithms can help you reach to the candidates 10x faster and save 80% of recruiter's time.

Try the Rootle.ai extension today and see how it can help you save your time and resources.
